<h2>Quick Glimpse</h2>

Microbial communities play a vital role in human health and disease. Investigating the role of microbial communities in health and disease requires a thorough knowledge of the entire process. This is <b>PART 1</b> of the practical user guide series. The code for part 1 is available at a public [GitHub repository](https://github.com/tmbuza/microbiome-part1/). If interested you can request a consulting service by contacting the developer using <a href="https://complexdatainsights.com/contact-us">this contact form</a>.
